org.epics.ioc.install
Interface Install

public interface Install

Install structures and records into the master database.

Author:
mrk

Method Detail

installStructures

boolean installStructures(java.lang.String xmlFile,
                          org.epics.pvData.pv.Requester requester)
Install structures into the master PVDatabase. A PVDatabase named beingInstalled is created. The xmlFile is parsed and the new structures put into beingInstalled. If no parse errors occur then the new structures are merged into master if 1) no record instances are found in beingInstalled, and 2) none of the structures in beingInstalled are already in the master database.

Parameters:
xmlFile - An xml file defining structures.
requester - The requester.
Returns:
(false,true) if the new structures (were not, were) merged into master.

installStructures

boolean installStructures(org.epics.pvData.pv.PVDatabase pvDatabase,
                          org.epics.pvData.pv.Requester requester)
Install structures into the master PVDatabase. The new structures are merged into master if 1) no record instances are found in pvDatabase, and 2) none of the structures in pvDatabase are already in the master database.

Parameters:
pvDatabase - The PVDatabase containing the structures to merge.
requester - The requester.
Returns:
(false,true) if the new structures (were not, were) merged into master.

installStructure

boolean installStructure(org.epics.pvData.pv.PVStructure pvStructure,
                         org.epics.pvData.pv.Requester requester)
Install a PVStructure into the master database. It is installed only if the master database does not already have a structure named structureName.

Parameters:
pvStructure - The structure to install.
requester - The requester.
Returns:
false,true) if the new structure (was not, was) merged into master.

installRecords

boolean installRecords(java.lang.String xmlFile,
                       org.epics.pvData.pv.Requester requester)
Install records into the master PVDatabase. A PVDatabase named beingInstalled is created. The xmlFile is parsed and the new records put into beingInstalled. If no parse errors occur then the new records are merged into master if 1) no structures are found in beingInstalled, and 2) none of the records in beingInstalled are already in the master database.

Parameters:
xmlFile - An xml file defining records.
requester - The requester.
Returns:
(false,true) if the new records (were not, were) merged into master.

installRecords

boolean installRecords(org.epics.pvData.pv.PVDatabase pvDatabase,
                       org.epics.pvData.pv.Requester requester)
Install records into the master PVDatabase. The new records are merged into master if 1) no structures are found in pvDatabase, and 2) none of the records in pvDatabase are already in the master database.

Parameters:
pvDatabase - The PVDatabase containing the records to merge.
requester - The requester.
Returns:
(false,true) if the new records (were not, were) merged into master.

installRecord

boolean installRecord(org.epics.pvData.pv.PVRecord pvRecord,
                      org.epics.pvData.pv.Requester requester)
Install a PVRecord into the master database. It is installed only if the master database does not already have a record named recordName.

Parameters:
pvRecord - The record to install.
requester - The requester.
Returns:
false,true) if the new record (was not, was) merged into master.
